Certificate Programme in Technology and Management

A blended Certificate Programme in Technology and Management jointly offered by IIM Bangalore and IIT Madras

Download Brochure Apply Now
CTM in the media

Programme Structure

CTM is a 11-month long programme, offered in four modules. Each module spans for about three months, comprising technical and management courses. At the end of each module, proctored exams will be conducted. On successful completion of the programme, the candidate receives a ‘Certificate in Technology and Management.

Domain Streams Module 1 Module 2 Module 3 Module 4
Management
  • Accounting & Finance
  • Managerial Economics
  • Marketing Management
  • Operations Management
  • Organizational Design
  • Strategic Management
Technology
  • Data Sciences
  • Data Visualization
  • Probability and Statistics for Data Sciences
  • Parameter Estimation and Linear Regression
  • Introduction to Machine Learning
Click here to play video

Course Curriculum

The programme comprises online courses from Technology and Management disciplines.

Technical Domain

Data Sciences

The Data Science stream will equip you to venture into data-driven computing and will cover all the essential topics such as Mathematical Foundations, Data Visualization and Machine Learning.

  • Data Visualisation
    • Mr. Kathirmani
    • Co-founder, Quelit
  • Probability and Statistics for Data Sciences
    • Prof. Nandan Sudarsanam
    • IIT Madras
  • Parameter Estimation and Linear Regression
    • Prof. Arun Tangirala
    • IIT Madras
  • Introduction to Machine Learning
    • Prof. Balaraman Ravindran,
    • IIT Madras

Management Domain

The Management Domain will help the students to gain a broad overview of the key concepts, tools and techniques needed to successfully meet the challenges of today’s global business environment.

Business and Management
  • Accounting and FInance
    • Prof. Narasimhan
    • IIM Bangalore
  • Managerial Economics
    • Prof. Subhashish Gupta
    • IIM Bangalore
  • Marketing Management
    • Prof. Ashis Mishra
    • IIM Bangalore
  • Operations Management
    • Prof. B Mahadevan
    • IIM Bangalore
  • Organizational Design
    • Prof. Sourav Mukherji
    • IIM Bangalore
  • Strategic Management
    • Rejie George Pallathita, P D Jose, Sai Yayavaram
    • Professors, IIM Bangalore

Admission Criteria

The programme follows a comprehensive admission procedure to ensure that the learners’ goals are oriented towards a challenging experience, simultaneously achieving diversity in both technical and management aspects. Participants are carefully chosen through interview and an aptitude test

Read more

Eligibility

  • An undergraduate degree in any stream.
  • At least 2 years of work experience.
  • There might be pre-requisites for a few courses.

Fees

Fees Indian Students International Students Deadline
On confirmation 50,000 INR 1000 USD On Accepting the Offer
1st Instalment 2,00,000 INR 3500 USD 15th June 2020
2nd Instalment 2,50,000 INR 4500 USD 30th November 2020
  • The programme is priced at Rs.5,00,000 (Exclusive of taxes) for Indian students and USD 9000 for international students.
  • Payment can be made in multiple instalments. Refer table.
  • In case of cancellation, the fee will be refunded only if the request is received at least 10 days prior to the start of the programme.
  • Cancellations during the run of the programme will not be refunded.
  • Financial assistance will be provided to deserving candidates upon request.

Pedagogy

A balanced mix of asynchronous sessions comprising videos and synchronous interactive sessions, along with projects and case discussions for a hands-on experience. During each module, the following methods of teaching are adopted.

  • Videos
  • Campus Connect Read more
  • Webinars
Campus Connect

A unique learning element of this programme is the opportunity to interact with the course instructors in person at IITM and IIMB campuses at least once during the run of each module. In addition, in each course, a Teaching Assistant (a subject matter expert) will guide you through the online learning journey through email and online discussion forums.
